creator: Apollo Neuroscience, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
This app requires an Apollo wearable.

There’s a whole new way to deal with stress.

Apollo is the first clinically validated wearable that actively helps your body adapt to stress, facilitating focus, sleep, energy, calm, and more.

When we’re stressed, our fight or flight response kicks in, making it hard to focus and sleep. Apollo rapidly restores balance to the nervous system by sending gentle waves of vibration that signal safety to the body through your sense of touch. Apollo works fast, at the moment that you need it, offering you control over your stress, so you can tackle whatever comes next.

Apollo is scientifically validated, naturally powerful, and safe.

Improve your:


• Calm
• Focus
• Physical recovery
• Sleep
• HRV

Pick from 7 distinct modes designed to help you reach different goals by relaxing your body and clearing your mind:

• Energy and Wake Up
• Social and Open
• Clear and Focused
• Rebuild and Recover
• Meditation and Mindfulness
• Relax and Unwind
• Sleep and Renew

The Apollo app also features:

• Badges - earnable badges to celebrate your progress towards better health and help you stay motivated
• Favorites - quickly navigate to your favorite programs and settings with your favorites list
descriptionShort: There’s a whole new way to deal with stress.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* We made a simpler sign in process. You’ll no longer need to remember a password to sign in to the app. Now just enter your email address and we’ll send you a temporary code that you can use to sign in. Hooray! No more having to remember an annoying password! Bonus - this two-factor authentication is even more secure.
* Better Bluetooth connectivity
* We’ve upgraded in-app updates, so you’ll get notified automatically when firmware updates are available
* Many visual improvements and bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed a bug that caused the app to not correctly recognize 0.11.x firmware message structures

- Updated Bluetooth SDKs
- Updated AWS SDKs

title: Apollo Neuro

creator: Apollo Neuroscience, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Apollo Neuroscience empowers you to be the best version of yourself by improving your resilience to stress so you can relax, focus, sleep better, and feel better — anytime, anywhere. The Apollo Neuro technology was developed to enable you to tap into your best self, effortlessly. The Apollo wearable helps you adapt to stress by harnessing the power of the nervous system.

When we’re stressed, our fight-or-flight response kicks in, making it hard to focus, sleep, and be present. The Apollo wearable restores balance to the nervous system by sending gentle waves of vibration that signal safety to the body through your sense of touch. The Apollo wearable is scientifically validated, naturally powerful, and safe. No drugs, no side effects. And goes where you go, day or night.

The first wearable that helps your body adapt to stress, for improved:
Calm
Sleep
Focus
Physical recovery
HRV

Pick from distinct modes designed to help you reach different goals by relaxing your body and clearing your mind:
Energy and Wake Up
Social and Open
Clear and Focused
Rebuild and Recover
Meditation and Mindfulness
Relax and Unwind
Sleep and Renew

The Apollo app also features:
Scheduling: Build a custom schedule to make Apollo part of your daily routine
Progress Tracking: Check in on your Apollo usage patterns and set new goals
Integrations: Connect Apollo to devices like Oura Ring to optimize your experience and log your usage as Mindful Minutes
descriptionShort: Get to know a calmer, more mindful you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
With every release of our app, we strive to make updates to help you reach your health goals. In this release, we added:
Improvements on the usage graph found in ‘Profile’
General bug fixes and improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved onboarding experience for new users to register and get started using the device
NEW feature: dark mode for low-light settings
NEW light patterns to indicate battery status and battery notifications in-app
‘What’s new?' screens to learn about new features for each new release
Ability to delete account through the app
Feedback form in Settings to submit feedback directly to Apollo Neuro for review
General bug fixes and improvements
Final release that includes support for Android 8.

Progress Tracking: Check in on your Apollo usage patterns and set new goals
Integrations: Connect Apollo to devices like Oura Ring to optimize your experience and log your usage as Mindful Minutes
descriptionShort: Get to know a calmer, more mindful you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release has focused on improvements to battery life, scheduling, usage, and BT connectivity

title: Apollo Neuro

creator: Apollo Neuroscience, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Apollo Neuroscience empowers you to be the best version of yourself by improving your resilience to stress so you can relax, focus, sleep better, and feel better — anytime, anywhere. The Apollo Neuro technology was developed to enable you to tap into your best self, effortlessly. The Apollo wearable helps you adapt to stress by harnessing the power of the nervous system.

When we’re stressed, our fight-or-flight response kicks in, making it hard to focus, sleep, and be present. The Apollo wearable restores balance to the nervous system by sending gentle waves of vibration that signal safety to the body through your sense of touch. The Apollo wearable is scientifically validated, naturally powerful, and safe. No drugs, no side effects. And goes where you go, day or night.

The first wearable that helps your body adapt to stress, for improved:
Calm
Sleep
Focus
Physical recovery
HRV

Pick from distinct modes designed to help you reach different goals by relaxing your body and clearing your mind:
Energy and Wake Up
Social and Open
Clear and Focused
Rebuild and Recover
Meditation and Mindfulness
Relax and Unwind
Sleep and Renew

The Apollo app also features:
Scheduling: Build a custom schedule to make Apollo part of your daily routine
Progress Tracking: Check in on your Apollo usage patterns and set new goals
Integrations: Connect Apollo to devices like Oura Ring to optimize your experience and log your usage as Mindful Minutes
descriptionShort: Get to know a calmer, more mindful you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improvements to battery display indicator
Improvements to the device firmware update procedure

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Sleep more with Apollo. Apollo Neuro is on a mission to give the world back 100 million more minutes of sleep. In this update, we launch new features to reveal your sleep gains, showing how much more sleep you’re getting by using your Apollo and the Apollo Benefits Score and usage tracking to help you get the most out of your experience for better sleep, focus, and calm. Also launched is Discover, so you can find the right Vibe for how you want to feel.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fixed an issue causing some users to be unable to install the latest firmware.
- Fixed two issues causing the app to sometimes "hang" on the loading screen.
- Fixed several bugs that may cause the app to crash silently, while in the background.
Thank you for feedback and your patience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Focused on app stability and connection improvements, this release includes fixes for our top issues being reported.
- Fixed several crashes happening in the background that caused longer wait times when connecting with the device.
- Fixed a bug that prevented some users from performing a firmware update.
- Fixed a bug that may prevent your scheduled Vibes from syncing with the device correctly.
Thank you again for your patience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Connection Improvements - Android 9+

NEW - Apollo Labs - Android 11+
Apollo Labs is an annual membership that unlocks our first AI-driven responsive wearable technology called Stay Asleep. Stay Asleep™, the first technology to detect unwanted wakeups in the night and respond to you by delivering soothing Apollo Vibes™ to help you stay asleep. Purchasing a membership also unlocks the Stay Asleep tracker within the app to visualize how often the wearable is responding while you sleep.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New - Customer support chat. Just tap on the settings icon then the chat icon on the top right of the screen.

New for Labs subscribers - Good Morning. A new Vibe that transitions you from sleep to daytime and helps you feel more energized, focused and awake.

Resolved an issue that may have prevented some Labs subscribers from seeing their sleep data.
Improved device sync performance and data reliability.

title: Apollo Neuro

creator: Apollo Neuroscience, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Apollo Neuro empowers you to be the best version of yourself by improving your resilience to stress so you can relax, focus, sleep better, and feel better — anytime, anywhere. The Apollo Neuro technology was developed to enable you to tap into your best self, effortlessly.

LESS STRESS, MORE SLEEP
The Apollo wearable helps you adapt to stress by harnessing the power of the nervous system.
When we’re stressed, our fight-or-flight response kicks in, making it hard to focus, sleep, and be present.
The Apollo wearable transforms how you feel through your sense of touch giving you more energy, less stress, a brighter mood, deeper relaxation & better flow. Apollo delivers soothing vibrations, called Apollo Vibes™, that are like music your body can feel — higher vibrations help improve our energy and focus, while lower vibrations reduce stress and help you relax.

TAKE CONTROL OF HOW YOU'D LIKE TO FEEL, TODAY
The first wearable that helps your body adapt to stress, for improved:
CALM
ENERGY
SLEEP
FOCUS
PHYSICAL RECOVERY
HRV

Pick from distinct Apollo Vibes designed to help you reach different goals by relaxing your body and clearing your mind:
Energy
Social
Focus
Power Nap
Recover
Calm
Unwind
Fall Asleep

The Apollo app also features:
SCHEDULING: Get a personalized schedule of Apollo Vibes based on your lifestyle to play throughout your day and night to maximize your energy levels, sleep, and overall well-being.
PROGRESS TRACKING: See the benefits you are experiencing for Sleep, Stress Relief and Focus
INTEGRATIONS: Connect to health tracking wearables like Oura Ring to make your Apollo experience more personalized for you.
descriptionShort: CALM BODY, CLEAR MIND

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Apollo Labs is now SmartVibes. Have a look at the new SmartVibes tab and see how Apollo is intelligently helping to improve your sleep.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For all users, this release brings dozens of bug fixes across all of the features in the app, an updated UI and an improved connection experience.

New for SmartVibes subscribers :
Introducing SmartVibes for Daytime - personalized Vibes that adapt to your needs, offering support all day long for effective stress management and optimal well-being.
Good Evening Vibe - Smoothly transitions you out of the busyness of the day
Love Vibe - Allows you to connect more deeply with loved ones.

SCHEDULING: Get a personalized schedule of Apollo Vibes based on your lifestyle to play throughout your day and night to maximize your energy levels, sleep, and overall well-being.
PROGRESS TRACKING: See the benefits you are experiencing for Sleep, Stress Relief and Focus
INTEGRATIONS: Connect to health tracking wearables like Oura Ring to make your Apollo experience more personalized for you.
descriptionShort: CALM BODY, CLEAR MIND
title:
Apollo Neuro
3.7.12

creator: Apollo Neuroscience, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Apollo Neuro empowers you to be the best version of yourself by improving your resilience to stress so you can relax, focus, sleep better, and feel better — anytime, anywhere. The Apollo Neuro technology was developed to enable you to tap into your best self, effortlessly.

LESS STRESS, MORE SLEEP
The Apollo wearable helps you adapt to stress by harnessing the power of the nervous system.
When we’re stressed, our fight-or-flight response kicks in, making it hard to focus, sleep, and be present.
The Apollo wearable transforms how you feel through your sense of touch giving you more energy, less stress, a brighter mood, deeper relaxation & better flow. Apollo delivers soothing vibrations, called Apollo Vibes™, that are like music your body can feel — higher vibrations help improve our energy and focus, while lower vibrations reduce stress and help you relax.

TAKE CONTROL OF HOW YOU'D LIKE TO FEEL, TODAY
The first wearable that helps your body adapt to stress, for improved:
CALM
ENERGY
SLEEP
FOCUS
PHYSICAL RECOVERY
HRV

Pick from distinct Apollo Vibes designed to help you reach different goals by relaxing your body and clearing your mind:
Energy
Social
Focus
Power Nap
Recover
Calm
Unwind
Fall Asleep

The Apollo app also features:
SCHEDULING: Get a personalized schedule of Apollo Vibes based on your lifestyle to play throughout your day and night to maximize your energy levels, sleep, and overall well-being.
PROGRESS TRACKING: See the benefits you are experiencing for Sleep, Stress Relief and Focus
INTEGRATIONS: Connect to health tracking wearables like Oura Ring to make your Apollo experience more personalized for you.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Resolved connection issues for supported legacy versions of Android.
Improved connection stability and performance for all officially supported versions of Android.
Resolved an issue preventing the device recovery tool from starting for Google Pixel users.
Resolved top crashes from the previous release.
